version_description:
- New, support for iPad!
- Ability to customize writing theme (background and font size) on iPad
- Bug fixes
Bug fixes.
Bug fixes.
Bug fixes.
Access Ginger's new Tutorials section in the app menu and maximize your Ginger experience​!

• Custom keyboard that works with Ginger Page
• Large selection of keyboard themes
• “Build Your Own Theme” editor
• iPad bug fixes relating to iOS 8 compatibility

- Quickly register and log in with G+
- Major improvements and bug fixes
- New themes to decorate your keyboard
- Now you can change your theme without leaving the keyboard

Optimized design for iPhone 6 and 6+
General bug fixes and performance enhancements
Major Auto-Correct improvements

- We've added rich text formatting – Bold, italics and underlining are all available
- Optimized layouts for iPhone 6, iPhone 6+
- Support for landscape mode in iPhone 6+
- Optimized Ginger Page to work with any keyboard

* US/UK dialect - Express yourself with either US or UK English
* Bug fixes & performance improvements.
修复Bug ：文本到语音的速度提升

* Bugfix: Occasional problems pasting into the editor
* Default Text to Speech accent is now English
Bug fixes
Bug fixes
Fix for G+ login issue
Minor UX improvements

* Screens adapted for optimal display on iPhone X
* Bugfixes in setting the background color of the editor

• Text to speech - Ability to control on the speaking rate and speaker type.
• Editor appearance control - Ability to control on the text size and switch to a dark background theme.
• Auto saves - User recent text is auto saved when app is minimized or closed.

This major update contains great improvements in the following features:
• Spelling and Grammar checker
• Sentence Rephrase
• Translator

Looking forward to your feedback!

• More improvements to our awesome grammar & spell checker
• Additions to the Sentence Rephrase

Looking forward to your feedback!
Feedback mechanism Improvements
Feedback mechanism Improvements

- Improvements to our awesome Smart Spell Checker
- Enhancements to our advanced Sentence Rephrasing Tool
- Fixes to our State of the Art Proofreader & Grammar Checker
- New Graphics & designs for easier use
Small modifications with the Graphics & designs

The following options are also available from the contextual text (selection) menu:
• Translate
• Define
• Synonyms
Several UI and Design improvements
Improvements to the smart suggestion processing.
Compatibility to iOS 13
Bug fixes

Bug fixes
